about_the_game:
The capital of his native Yuldigard Alzia is torn apart by a civil war, in order to avoid death, the prince has to flee the city, pretending to be a wanderer. He has to find refuge in the provincial town of Torchbergen, but this visit is destined to drag on for a long time ...
The game is visual novell-detective thriller
In the demo you will find:
Exciting plot and dialogs
Several endings
Carefully created characters both externally and internally
Point-and-click elements of gameplay
Beautiful soundtrack by Xanarini

name: Yuldigard's Fate Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
